# Torimochi

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="torimochi"
  type="torimochi"
  data-type="banner"
  data-area="300x250"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

Supported parameters:

### Required parameters

-   `data-adtype`
-   `data-area`
-   `data-wid`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-tcid`
-   `data-extra`
